H0.text: who was elected president in mexico in 2000. Ernesto Zedillo

H1.text: who was elected president in mexico in 2000. Cuauhtémoc Cárdenas

H2.text: who was elected president in mexico in 2000. Carlos Salinas de Gortari

H3.text: who was elected president in mexico in 2000. Vicente Fox

A4.text: Fox won the presidential election with 43% (15,989,636 votes) of the popular vote.

A5.text: Fox was elected president on the National Action Party (PAN) ticket in the 2000 election.
